name: Dungeon Dave 32
description: This is a super early prototype to a 3D dungeon crawler I've been tinkering with for a few weeks now. It's done in GameMaker: Studio making use of the limited 3D drawing and written in GML (the only way you can do anything 3D in GM:S). I'm not sure if I'm going to stick with the project. This current build has 2 rooms that you can move back and forth in.
